page.title: 02AT HOME IN GLENLUCE
page.content: In Glenluce there are some very old houses,most of which are in Main Street .Some are{listed buildings which means they can't be altered without permission.There are many {council houses}in the village.Most are rented but some have been bought.There are 122 of them, built between 1930 and 1982.To rent a 3-bedroomed council house costs Â£17.31 per week plus rates at Â£5.24.
